verbose_text: Even in high metastatic cell lines, such as salivary gland adenoid cystic carcinoma, sulforaphane induces G2-M arrest and apoptosis with a marked decline in protein levels of G (2)/M regulatory proteins including cyclin B1 and cyclin dependent kinase 1 (CDK1) along with increased expression of Bax and down-regulation of Bcl-2 proteins [XREF_BIBR].
